thread.title: Eli Zabar Plans a Lower East Side Dining Spot

author: Charles Passy
title: Eli Zabar Plans a Lower East Side Dining Spot
text:
As a restaurateur and gourmet-market operator, Eli Zabar has built his reputation by focusing largely on Manhattan’s Upper East Side, where he runs more than 10 establishments.
Now, after three decades in the neighborhood, he is turning his attention elsewhere—specifically, the Lower East Side.
In partnership with his son Oliver, Eli Zabar... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
